channel.title: Go on Ilija Eftimov
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Ilija Eftimov

item.title: Diving in the Upcoming Go Error Inspection Changes
item.description: The team behind the language started working on a document titled “Go 2 Draft Designs”. The draft document is part of the design process for Go v2.0. In this article we will zoom in at the proposal for error inspection in Go 2. What’s worth noting is that this is still part of a draft proposal. Still, from where we are standing at the moment, it’s certain that these changes will be added to the language.
